doc.previous: Hence subtraction can be defined as the addition of the additive inverse  The negation or additive inverse of an integer is obtained by reversing the order of the pair
doc.after: The standard ordering on the integers is given by  It is easily verified that these definitions are independent of the choice of representatives of the equivalence classes
